An impatient gamer is waiting for his game to download.

You are the computer! Download the game as fast as you can!

(there are some badges which one do you have? Share in the comments (; )

1. move with WAD or arrow keys

2. collect shields and documents

3. wath out for viruses, hackers and cookies

4. have fun 😁

Puh... 

At the last second my project is finally finished - 2 hours 53 minutes

But, I think it was worth it. I mean, I never thought, that I will finish it in time.

And I think the game is quite cool. What do you think? Do you have noticed bugs? Let me know in the comments!
